headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin to control Govee devices that are supported by the official Govee API.

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: The API key linked to your Govee account. This is obtained through the Govee mobile app.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: If enabled, more information will be added to the Homebridge log.

debugReqRes.title: Request & Response Logging
debugReqRes.description: If enabled, HTTP, web socket and LAN mode messages will be added to the log. Not recommended for long-term use.

layout.title: Optional
layout.description: Only adjust these settings if you know what you are doing.
